Waterbear Field School

Hands-on community workshops teaching energy, water, food, shelter, climate, communication, fabrication, transport, arts & crafts.

Current Workshops

Our workshops are typically held outdoors, in most weather. Pricing, format, and location vary by workshop and by teacher. Click on a workshop below to find out more!
